val.text: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'gatsby' import { CommentCount } from 'disqus-react' // highlight-line import { Meta, TagList, Calendar, Timer, Comments } from './styles' export const disqusConfig = ({ slug, title }) => ({ shortname: process.env.GATSBY_DISQUS_NAME, config: { identifier: slug, title }, }) const PostMeta = ({ title, slug, date, timeToRead, tags }) => ( {date} {timeToRead} min read // highlight-start // highlight-end ) export default PostMeta
val.html:
import React from 'react'
import { Link } from 'gatsby'
import { CommentCount } from 'disqus-react' 

import { Meta, TagList, Calendar, Timer, Comments } from './styles'

export const disqusConfig = ({ slug, title }) => ({
  shortname: process.env.GATSBY_DISQUS_NAME,
  config: { identifier: slug, title },
})

const PostMeta = ({ title, slug, date, timeToRead, tags }) => (
  <Meta>
    <span>
      <Calendar size="1.2em" />
      {date}
    </span>
    <span>
      <Timer size="1.2em" />
      {timeToRead} min read
    </span>
    <span>
      <Comments size="1.2em" />
      <Link to={slug + `#disqus_thread`}>
        <CommentCount {...disqusConfig({ slug, title })} />
      </Link>
    </span>
    <TagList tags={tags} />
  </Meta>
)

export default PostMeta
